Invocation Name: just tech facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Just Tech Facts skill tells you random and short tech secrets and facts in less than one line. Sourced from tweets by @AllTechSecrets, this skill has a lot of interesting technology facts.

NEED YOUR OWN SKILL?

If you are looking for your own Alexa skill or a skill for your brand, write to us at kotra[at]holikau.org

Developer Privacy Policy
